title: Disable Tracking for Personalized Advertising
description: Disables the collection and submission of telemetry and usage data to Apple which could be used to provide a more personally targeted advertising experience on your mac

allowApplePersonalizedAdvertising.title: Allow Apple Personalized Advertising
allowApplePersonalizedAdvertising.description: If false, disables the collection and submission of personal and system stats to be used for targeted advertisement presentations

forceLimitAdTracking.title: Limit ad tracking
forceLimitAdTracking.description: If true, limits the collection and submission of personal and system stats to be used for targeted advertisement presentations
